input.sentences: the temple was built in the traditional japanese architectural design .
hundreds of people went there daily .
inside were beautiful statutes of buddha .
my friend [male] was excited to go inside .
so were my other two friends .
output.sentences: I've always wanted to see a traditional japanese temple.
Hundreds of people tour this temple each day.
This isn't the pot-bellied buddha I expected to see but, he'll do.
My friend, Josh, posing in front of the temple.
And, here I am with Gary.
